params.text:
🚀 Starting CC Fee Letter Agent...
📧 Professional fee letter generation and email automation
🧹 Clearing Python cache for fresh start
🌐 Opening in browser at http://localhost:8505

params.message: echo '🧹 Clearing Python cache...' && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
echo '📦 Ensuring Streamlit is ready...' && pip install --upgrade streamlit pandas openpyxl rapidfuzz jinja2 msal requests python-dotenv langchain langchain-community
echo '🚀 Starting Streamlit application...' && python -m streamlit run vc_agent_streamlit.py --server.port 8505 --server.headless true --browser.gatherUsageStats false --server.address 0.0.0.0
